title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, Burrow, Durant
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, Burrow, Durant
description:
The Lakers continue to play poorly

Colin makes the argument that Joe Burrow should be the MVP

Kevin Durant should've stayed with the Warriors


Guest: Jonathan Taylor
